search.base_xpath: Base xpath of url, name and author.(OPTION)

desc.catalogue_url_xpath: If this parameter is not available, the search result is the directory page.(OPTION)
desc.multi_page: Whether the directory is paged.(bool, default is false)

retry_time: Page access retries.(number, default is 5 times)
download_sleep: Download interval of each chapter.(number, default is 0.3s)
saved_dir: Novel storage directory.(Default is current dir, OPTION)
append_mode: Whether it is in append mode. It is recreated by default.(bool, default is false)
debug: (bool, default is false) Whether run in debug mode.
debug_display: (string, OPTION) Debug mode display info type, like: 'html,url,xpath,info',
